headline.main: ROME AND NEW-YORK.; A Venomous Letter from Archbishop Hughes.

docs.lead_paragraph: To the Editor of the New-York Tribune SIR: On the 9th of January, 1857, H. J. RAYMOND, Esq., Editor of the New-YORK DAILY TIMES, publishes in his paper a mendacious and scur??ilons article against Archbishop HUGHES.
docs.abstract: Letter to the Tribune on H.J. Raymond
